title: Have You Ever Dream To Visit Churu District Of Rajasthan
text:
Have You Ever Dream To Visit Churu District Of Rajasthan Have You Ever Dream To Visit Churu District Of Rajasthan 0 
Be the first tourist to discover the exceptional features and sites of the district. Sure that in the region you will earn new experience of holiday and you will enjoy to the fullest. Visit and have memorable time in the destination with your near and dear ones. 
HIGHLIGHTS OF THE DISTRICT - The beautiful location was established in the year 1620 A.D by Churru (Head of the Jhats of its time). Livelihoods of the local people are Agriculture and Animal Husbandry. The destination is exceptional; during your tour you will experience varieties of lush green vegetations. Salasar Balaji and Balaji Babosa are two sacred places of worship in the district. Interact local people and make your experience a memorable moment. 
PLACES OF TOURSIT INTEREST: 
The numbers of interesting sites in the district are less than other districts of the state. But, these few locations are enough to make your Rajasthan tour an exceptional holiday. Names of the famous attractive sites are - 
Amazing Tal Chhapar Sanctuary is a famous site for the conservation and protection of endangered Black-Duck Species in the district of Churu. The landscape is covered with varieties of fauna and offers an eco-friendly environment so that visitors can relax in refreshing mood. Discover the 210 kilometres wide forest with great enjoyment. Fauna available in the complex of the Sanctuary are Eagles, Brown Dove, Skylark, Kashmir Rollers, Blue Jay, Sparrow Hawk, Green bee-eaters, Blue cheeked bee-eaters and Crested Lark. Travel in and around the wildlife habitat and enjoy bird watching. Have a lovely time. 
Local people are very religious and spiritual in their nature. Among the sacred places of worship in the destination - SALASAR BALAJI TEMPLE is the most popular one. The sacred site is situated in the beautiful Salasar town. Here worship diety of Lord Hanuman and Balaji. The destination is famous among visitors as Salasar Dham. Offer prayer in the temple to have a blissful life in the times to come. The religious temple is overflow with devotees and vacationers during the festivals of Chaitra Purnima and Ashwin Purnima. These are the two most religious days of Hindus. Other temples located nearby are Temple of Anjani Mata, Dhunia of Mohandas Ji, Samadhi Sthal of Kanidadi and Mohan Mandir. 
Other places where you can rejuvenate mind, body and soul are Malji Ka Kamra, Surana Haveli, Aath Kambh Chhatri, Ratangarh Fort, Kanhaiyalal Bagla Haveli, Raghunathji Mandir, Godia Chhatri and Sethani Ka Johara. 
These are suggested destinations you can visit during your journey. Your travel itinerary can be booked in advance according to your interest and choice. Advance booking is available and very easy in present days. Consult a travel expert and plan everything properly so you will enjoy hassle free voyage. Discover Churu with great happiness.
